titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2-amino-5-chloro-N,3-dimethylbenzamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/13/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-amino-5-chloro-N,3-dimethylbenzamide.
